Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.lambdaworks.redis.AbstractRedisClient.eventLoopGroup
    use map eventLoopGroups instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.lambdaworks.redis.LettuceFutures.await(RedisCommand<K, V, T>, long, TimeUnit)
    The method name does not reflect what the method is doing, therefore it is deprecated. Use LettuceFutures.awaitOrCancel(RedisCommand, long, TimeUnit) instead. The semantics did not change and LettuceFutures.awaitOrCancel(RedisCommand, long, TimeUnit) simply calls this method.
    com.lambdaworks.redis.RedisKeysConnection.exists(K)
    Use RedisKeysConnection.exists(Object[]) instead
    com.lambdaworks.redis.RedisKeysAsyncConnection.exists(K)
    Use RedisKeysAsyncConnection.exists(Object[]) instead
    com.lambdaworks.redis.cluster.models.slots.ClusterSlotRange.getMaster()
    Use ClusterSlotRange.getMasterNode() to retrieve the nodeId and the slaveOf details.
    com.lambdaworks.redis.cluster.models.slots.ClusterSlotRange.getSlaves()
    Use ClusterSlotRange.getSlaveNodes() to retrieve the nodeId and the slaveOf details.
    com.lambdaworks.redis.RedisListsConnection.lpushx(K, V)
    Use RedisListsConnection.lpushx(Object, Object[])
    com.lambdaworks.redis.RedisListsAsyncConnection.lpushx(K, V)
    Use RedisListsAsyncConnection.lpushx(Object, Object[])
    com.lambdaworks.redis.RedisListsConnection.rpushx(K, V)
    Use RedisListsConnection.rpushx(Object, Object[])
    com.lambdaworks.redis.RedisListsAsyncConnection.rpushx(K, V)
    Use RedisListsAsyncConnection.rpushx(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object[])
    com.lambdaworks.redis.protocol.ConnectionWatchdog.setReconnect(boolean)
    use ConnectionWatchdog.setListenOnChannelInactive(boolean)
    com.lambdaworks.redis.RedisAsyncConnectionImpl.shutdown()
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.lambdaworks.redis.AbstractRedisClient()
    use AbstractRedisClient.AbstractRedisClient(ClientResources)
    com.lambdaworks.redis.cluster.models.slots.ClusterSlotRange(int, int, HostAndPort, List<HostAndPort>)
    Use ClusterSlotRange.ClusterSlotRange(int, int, RedisClusterNode, List)
    com.lambdaworks.redis.RedisClient()
    Use the factory method RedisClient.create()
    com.lambdaworks.redis.RedisClient(RedisURI)
    Use the factory method RedisClient.create(RedisURI)
    com.lambdaworks.redis.RedisClient(String)
    Use the factory method RedisClient.create(String)
    com.lambdaworks.redis.RedisClient(String, int)
    Use the factory method RedisClient.create(RedisURI)
    com.lambdaworks.redis.cluster.RedisClusterClient(List<RedisURI>)
    Use RedisClusterClient.create(Iterable)
    com.lambdaworks.redis.cluster.RedisClusterClient(RedisURI)
    Use RedisClusterClient.create(RedisURI)
